description: Update Design/Branding settings for User Groups.
name: branding_edit

admin_style.description: The actual CSS. Example: test color: green; (ONLY AVAILABLE FOR CERTAIN PLANS)

admin_template.description: The actual HTML template (ONLY AVAILABLE FOR CERTAIN PLANS)

api_output.description: xml, json, or serialize (default is XML)

branding_footer_html_val.description:
Content of non-removeable footer. Example:

footer content here

branding_header_html_val.description:
Content of non-removable header. Example:

header content here

design_url.description: URL of logo. Large logos appear on the login page.

design_url_small.description: URL of small logo. Small logos appear in the header of the admin panel.

footer_text_value.description: Content of non-removeable footer. Example: text footer content

header_text_value.description: Content of non-removable header. Example: text header content

links.description: External links. To enable (which is the default) exclude this parameter entirely. To disable (remove our branding), just pass this parameter with any value.

public_style.description: The actual CSS. Example: test color: green; (ONLY AVAILABLE FOR CERTAIN PLANS)

public_template.description: The actual HTML template (ONLY AVAILABLE FOR CERTAIN PLANS)

site_name.description: Title of software. Example: 'ActiveCampaign Email Marketing'
